author: Miller Kern
title: Get your mom something extra-cozy for Mother's Day this year
description:
TL;DR: As of April 20, Purple is offering up to 20% off accessory bundles ahead of Mother's Day.

Mother's Day is May 10 this year, and it's going to be a weird one. Most of us probably won't get to spend the day with our moms and/or mother figures because of…
